Text: andbir, will you be uploading the remaining episodes of season 1? would be forever grateful
i suppose i could, but will take some few days for me to get them, check back on friday or so!
ok, dont go through any trouble :) just thought if you had them on your harddrive

well as of this moment i have 85% of episodes 3-10 down and running, and ~20% of episodes 11-22 which i am downloading at a lower priority so i guess 3-10 should be here by tomorrow friday at the latest

I was looking for these episodes for a long time! Please upload as many as you can. I will download and seed as much as I can.
Thanks a lot!
